mapper.select: SELECT tmp.dbSum AS dbSum, tmp.dbConnectSum AS dbConnectSum, tmp.dbDisconnectSum AS dbDisconnectSum, tmp.dbUnsentSum AS dbUnsentSum, IFNULL(round(tmp.dbConnectSum * 100 / tmp.dbSum, 2), '100.00') AS dbConnectRate FROM ( SELECT COUNT(ID) AS dbSum, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN mar.IS_ONLINE = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS dbConnectSum, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN mar.IS_ONLINE = '0' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS dbDisconnectSum, IFNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN mar.IS_ONLINE is null OR mar.IS_ONLINE = '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0) AS dbUnsentSum FROM MONITOR_DB mar) tmp
